name: Cathay Pacific Business Class
description:
A couple of years ago I flew (and reviewed) Cathay Pacific's business class.  I wasn't impressed.  Whilst seats were great I was left cold by the service and disappointed by the meals.  On a recent trip to Europe I decided to give them another go - this video shows how it went.  

I must say, in my opinion, Cathay Pacific have really turned it around.  Their crew were friendly, happy and engaging - they were eager to please and their service was top notch.  The meals too were a vast improvement on Cathay's previous offerings.

On this Cathay business class review I also cover the lounge at Adelaide Airport, boarding, take off, the Cathay Pacific business class seat, the Cathay inflight entertainment system, amenities kit and landing in Hong Kong.   Join me and we'll indulge in the luxury of Cathay Pacific.  

For more flight reviews please check out my channel or the links at the bottom of this description.  

Route:    Adelaide (ADL) to Hong Kong (HKG)
Length:  4,277 miles,  8:20 hrs
Flight:     CX174
When:    July 2018
Aircraft:  Airbus A330-342   registration B-LAF - Aug 2007
Seat:       17A
Camera:  Sony FDR-AXP53


This video may not be reproduced without specific permission.
